name: Pulmonology Respiratory Screening Package
description: Comprehensive pulmonary and respiratory screening protocols including expanded 2024 lung cancer screening guidelines

screening_types.name: Lung Cancer Screening - LDCT
screening_types.description: Low-dose CT screening for lung cancer (2024 expanded guidelines)

screening_types.name: Chest X-ray
screening_types.description: Standard chest radiography for pulmonary assessment

screening_types.name: Pulmonary Function Test
screening_types.description: Spirometry and comprehensive pulmonary function testing

screening_types.name: Pulmonary Function Test - COPD
screening_types.description: Regular spirometry monitoring for COPD patients

screening_types.name: Alpha-1 Antitrypsin
screening_types.description: Alpha-1 antitrypsin deficiency screening for early-onset emphysema

screening_types.name: Tuberculosis Screening
screening_types.description: TB screening with interferon-gamma release assay or tuberculin skin test

screening_types.name: Sleep Study Screening
screening_types.description: Sleep apnea screening questionnaire and overnight sleep study

screening_types.name: Occupational Lung Disease Screening
screening_types.description: Screening for occupational lung diseases in high-risk workers

screening_types.name: Asthma Control Assessment
screening_types.description: Regular asthma control evaluation and spirometry

screening_types.name: High-Resolution CT Chest
screening_types.description: HRCT for interstitial lung disease and pulmonary fibrosis evaluation

screening_types.name: Bronchoscopy Screening
screening_types.description: Flexible bronchoscopy for suspected lung cancer or endobronchial disease
